name: Firefly (itch) (EzraKiteck, CaffeineNCode)
description:
Firefly is a puzzle platformer where you play as a pilot who crash landed in a dark, smelly swap. Your goal is to find the missing parts to your airplane so that you can escape, but you may need some help along the way...

Controls:
Move and jump with the arrow keys.
Call for the firefly with [W], and tell him to stay with [S].
When the firefly gets stuck in a flytrap, mash [R] to help him get out!

This is a submission for the LM0B Beginner's Game Jam #8. The theme was "Unstable", so we interpreted that as "unstable" platforms. The leafy platforms will decay if they are not in the firefly's light, except for the blue nocturnal leaves that grow in the dark.

Programming, UI, and game design: Kolby Trammell
Art, animation, and music: Ezra Kiteck
